title: Lol Freezes During game & I hear a windows noise (pop up) noise???
body:
Anybody know what this issue might be? I just got a new computer and for 2 days it was fine. Now during the game my screen will suddenly freeze and I will hear the windows ping noise. Just like it disconnects my screen for a couple seconds....
Anybody know what this is and how to fix it?

replies.body: Hmmmm it kinda sounds like that pinging noise might be one of the generic windows error messages. If you haven't yet, be sure to run a quick repair through the game client settings to first make sure all the files are working properly. If that doesn't help at first, go ahead and also check for any driver updates using the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) if needed!

I ran a repair and it is still happening... just got a new pc and everything is fully updated.
Anyone else having this issue

Make sure you check those steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as well! There are a few other things that could be going on, and those steps help cover most of them, the rest of which our techs can help with in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
